text: (nabiye!) samanayan taba namadinnangen kavurun ho oba veta araksava pætuvahot allahge ayavan ohu savan dena turu ohuta araksava sapayanu. (ohu eya savan di visvasaya notæbuvahot) ohuva, ohuta araksava sapayana (venat) sthanayakata yavanu mænava! mandayat niyata vasayenma ovun dænuma næti janatavak vasayen sitinneya
